about_the_game: SMS Plus GX is an enhanced version which includes improved accuracy, bug fixes with most games and others. SMS Plus GX will let you play your good old home system games from 1986 and it will also let you play games for an 8bit 4th generation handheld game console released in the early '90s.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.

name: RetroArch - SMS Plus GX

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.
